body.name: S504 Suction Cup Dash Cam Mount Holder (5th Gen) with 4pcs 360 Rotating Joints for Apeman Ssontong Biuone iZEEKER HaHoco and Most Other Car Dash Cameras
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 5 mins
FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: ★S504 dash cam mount is the newest version, it is 1/2 smaller than the old model, compact and does not affect the sightline, size with 4 different joints suitable for most popular Apeman brand dash cam, such as Apeman dash cam, Ssontong dash cam, Biuone dash cam, iZEEKERdash cam, HaHoco dash cam, and most other car dash cameras.
★ [360 Degrees Rotation] Adjust the 360 degrees joint to get any angle you need, providing you with the best viewing to keep secure driving. Just enjoy the best driving experience.

★The dash cam mount uses POM+ABS plastic , Sturdy and heat resistant. The suction cup used PVC material, diameter 53cm. Remove the mount easily by pulling the suction clip without leaving any nasty marks.

★Secure & Stable, Sportway dash cam mount featured with upgraded super strong suction cup, The rotary type instead of the press type can better discharge the air in the suction cup and reach the vacuum state. Even on the bumpiest road, It is still easy to sticks securely on the windshield or dashboard. Just make sure to remove all air from underneath. The suction mount is made of high-quality material which make it be able to work for a long time.

★Easy to Install and remove, Remove the suction cup protective film, fix it on on the Windshield, press the suction cup firmly to exhaust the air, then twist right to lock it on the surface area, twist left to unlock it, make it easy to place dash cam wherever you need.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 360 Degree Rotation Adjust the 360 degree swivel joint to get best driving view ,suitable for most car dash camera, Action camera etc. 180 Degree " Y Style " Rotation Adjustable arms and high-quality buckles can fix your camera and meet 180 degree angle you want. A powerful locking suction cup mount helps you to record life. Press the suction cup firmly to exhaust the air, then twist right to lock it on the surface area, twist left to unlock it. Reusable Suction Cup Only need to wash and dried naturally , keep the suction cup clean and no dust , the force will be strong as before .

Sportway Dash Cam Suction Mount S504 This SS504 Dash Cam Suction Cup Mount can be easily secured to windshield or dashboard and allow you to attach up to 5kg（11lbs) accessories, idea for attaching things like dash cam, sport cam. Come with 4 pcs of 360 Swivel head joint for your choice to fit your dash cam, you also can disassembled the joint from your own original mount then installed to our suction mount. Material: POM+ABS+PVC+Screw Size:φ5.5*H5.5cm Mount Net weight: 70g Bearing weight: ≤ 5 kgs(11 Ib) Tolerable Temperature Range:-20℃～70℃ Widely Compatible: ( Including but not limited) Main Suitable for Rove, Nexar, Z-Edge, Kingslim, iiwey, NIUTA and Most Other Car Dash Cameras.
S40 S30 S10 S60 S80 Joints 10pcs 10pcs 6pcs 10pcs 16pcs Generations 3rd 2nd 1st 4th 4th

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good like the one that came with it. Apeman camera I have and this is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Camera window mount replacement. Works great !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It does the job
reviews.reviewText: The only thing I didn’t like was the mounting set up. It isn’t easy to find another one to replace it and I had to buy a couple and use pieces to make a new one cuz guess what? The tape didn’t hold up through even 2 days! The pic and functionality are great! Just the mounting issues. I wish it came with a suction cup option and not the cheap double sided tape

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Has all different peices so it fit

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My car camera started falling off the window and I purchased this to replace the worn out suction cup. It fit perfectly and hasn’t failed yet.
